author: jacopoc
msg: Removed unnecessary position attributes: if the position attribute is not set, applications are sorted by title.

author: dsh
msg: added SCM element

author: dsh
msg: * added the following plugins:
* org.apache.openejb.branding
* org.apache.openejb.help
* org.apache.openejb.help.nl1
* org.apache.openejb.help.nl2
* org.apache.openejb.help.nl2a
* org.apache.openejb.help.nlBdi
* added an updatesite
* Externalized any strings into message.properties files
* message.properties will be accessed by a Message class (Eclipse mechanism)
* did the German translation for the properties files
* externalized featureName, providerName and pluginName beside
of other strings found in feature.xml/plugin.xml into properties
files and translated them into German
* added legal stuff like license files (license.html and about.html)
* added context help IDs to each wizard page
*open issues:
* did not manage to include messages.properties files while assembling a JAR using Maven

author: ehatcher
msg: Enlighted by Hoss' question, clarify a bit more about nesting Solr within a larger web application

author: kwsutter
msg: OPENJPA-540.  Committing a simpler version of the patch.  Got rid of the ClassResolver classloader and am now just relying on the Class.forName() classloading.  This is similar to the processing used for the other *ManagedRuntime classes.
